name: Vermilion Bird
description:
A fisherman and his boat are lost at sea. His journey is to travel across the sea to the southern islands in search of medicinal herbs for his new born child.

Help save them both by turning to the mansions (constellations) in the sky for navigation and find the Vermilion Bird.

Created for Make-A-Thing January 2017 utilising the three words:
  • Remedy
  • Vermilion
  • Parallel
